"my.h" 

/*
    my.h
 */


#ifndef __MY_H__
#define __MY_H__


#include "rkhsm.h"


typedef struct
{
    RKHEVT_T event;
    rkhuint16 ts;
} MYEVT_T;


typedef struct
{
    rkhuint8 x;
    rkhuint8 y;
} MYHDATA_T;


/*
    Declare HSM.
 */

RKH_DCLR_HSM( my );


/*
    Declare states and pseudostates.
 */

RKH_DCLR_COMP_STATE     S1,S3,S11;
RKH_DCLR_BASIC_STATE    S2,S31,S32,S111,S112,S12;
RKH_DCLR_COND_STATE     C1,C2;
RKH_DCLR_JUNC_STATE     J;
RKH_DCLR_DHIST_STATE    DH;
RKH_DCLR_SHIST_STATE    H;


#endif
